definition: seat/base/stand/CL:個|个[ge4]/classifier for buildings, mountains and similar immovable objects
cabin/the hold of a ship or airplane

sentences.english: The pilots looked outside the cockpit window and saw that the plane was coated by a thin cloud.
sentences.chinese: 駕駛員注視座艙窗外，看到飛機被一層薄雲覆蓋。

sentences.english: The systems deliver moving maps and other information via cockpit displays.
sentences.chinese: 該系統通過座艙顯示器提供移動地圖和其他資料。

sentences.english: The aircraft can be fitted with a fixed aerial refuelling probe on the starboard side of the cockpit.
sentences.chinese: 戰機座艙的右舷可以安裝固定的空中加油受油頭。

sentences.english: The pilot sits in the cockpit located above the air intake and in front of the canard.
sentences.chinese: 飛行員座艙位於進氣口上方並在鴨翼前方。

sentences.english: It pierces the canopy but misses Quaritch.
sentences.chinese: 毒刺貫穿了座艙罩，但沒刺到誇裏奇。

sentences.english: Two engines are podded to the helicopter just to the rear of the cockpit.
sentences.chinese: 直升飛機上二臺發動機莢艙在駕駛員座艙的後面。

sentences.english: The GAU-8 gun system is under the cockpit and the nose.
sentences.chinese: 8火炮系統安裝在座艙和機頭的下方。

sentences.english: The rear seat cabin area can be used for hauling bulky cargo.
sentences.chinese: 後部座艙面積可用於拖運大件貨物。

sentences.english: Atlantis was chosen as the first orbiter to receive the glass cockpit.
sentences.chinese: 亞特蘭蒂斯被選爲第一個軌道器獲得的玻璃座艙。

sentences.english: Early Bell47 models had open cockpits or sheet metal cabins.
sentences.chinese: 早期的貝爾47型號座艙是開放式的。

sentences.english: We feel like in a subaquatic cockpit with delicate golden reflections.
sentences.chinese: 我們覺得好像在一個半水生的座艙裏精緻的金色反光。

sentences.english: An in-flight refuelling probe can be installed on the starboard side of the cockpit.
sentences.chinese: 可以在駕駛員座艙右側安裝一個空中加油探頭。

sentences.english: After the three-point landing gear to the cockpit for the whole open.
sentences.chinese: 起落架爲後三點式，駕駛員座艙爲全開放式。
